official-title.#text:
Supporting the goals and ideals of
		  International Water Safety Day.

cosponsor.#tail:
) submitted the
			 following resolution; which was referred to the

text.#text:
supports the goals and ideals of
			 International Water Safety Day;

acknowledges the
			 importance of water safety and that every person should engage in water safety
			 education; and

acknowledges that
			 every person should learn to swim.

Whereas fatal unintentional drowning is the second leading
			 cause of death for children 1 to 14 years of age;

Whereas fatal unintentional drowning is the sixth leading
			 cause of death for people of all ages;
Whereas drowning deaths are an epidemic;

Whereas water safety education and water safety awareness
			 can help curve the number of drowning fatalities;

Whereas courses such as CPR have shown to improve outcomes
			 for drowning victims since interventions occur more quickly;

Whereas water safety is a life skill that can be taught;
			 and

Whereas water safety education should be included in
			 primary and secondary school education: Now, therefore, be it
